title: Surya
body:
<<Surya>>
You are the new guardian, right? 
What are you doing here?

<<Tala>>
I’m going to the [b]Dreaming Kingdom[/b]. 
I think something’s wrong with the Realm of Dreams. 
<<Tala>>
I must report the Nightmare’s unusual behavior to the [b]Master of Dreams[/b].

<<Surya>>
You don’t have any idea of what is happening right now? 
It’s better if you stay in your area...
<<Surya>>
...because the [b]Mare[/b] captured the [b]Master of Dreams[/b].

<<Tala>>
The Mare? The [b]Mistress of Nightmares[/b]?!

<<Surya>>
I warn you not to go on your quest anymore. 
It’s too risky...

<<Tala>>
I’m not turning down on my quest...
I’ll go to the [b]Dreaming Kingdom[/b] to help the people fight against the Mare!

<<Surya>>
Eh. Good luck with dying.
